snippet: The Patriots have seemingly reveled in showing that although the Colts’ Andrew Luck may be the N.F.L.’s future, Tom Brady is the league’s present.
abstract: NFL preview of AFC Championship matchup between New England Patriots and Indianapolis Colts.
lead_paragraph: The Patriots have seemingly reveled in showing that although the Colts’ Andrew Luck may be the N.F.L.’s future, Tom Brady is the league’s present.

headline.main: Indianapolis Colts at New England Patriots: A.F.C. Championship Preview
headline.print_headline: Indianapolis Colts at New England Patriots: A.F.C. Championship Matchup
